languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Спасение населенного мира{/d} — недостаточная для тебя причина?" {n}Хейнрикс разочарованно цыкает.{/n} "Я могу предположить, что обитатели мира будут готовы расстаться со всем, что имеют, в обмен на помощь. Разумеется, ты получишь ту часть реквизированного, которую я и Эмелина не сочтем опасным или подпадающим под запрет Священной Инквизиции".

"{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Спасение населенного мира{/d} — недостаточная для тебя причина?" {n}Хейнрикс разочарованно цыкает.{/n} "Я могу предположить, что обитатели мира будут готовы расстаться со всем, что имеют, в обмен на помощь. Разумеется, ты получишь ту часть реквизированного, которую я и Эмелина не сочтем опасным или подпадающим под запрет Священной Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "Saving an inhabited world is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

"Saving an inhabited world is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

"Saving an inhabited world is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

"{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

languages.text: “{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}拯救有人居住的世界{/d}，莫非这件事情本身对你而言还不够吗？”{n}海因里希发出了失望的啧啧声。{/n}“我推测，行星上的居民愿意拿出他们所有财产，换取你的援助。当然，那些我和艾米莉娜认为很危险，审判庭禁止触碰的东西除外。除此之外，我们征用来的一切资源，都可以归你所有。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “拯救有人居住的世界，莫非这件事情本身对你而言还不够吗？”{n}海因里希发出了失望的啧啧声。{/n}“我推测，行星上的居民愿意拿出他们所有财产，换取你的援助。当然，那些我和艾米莉娜认为很危险，审判庭禁止触碰的东西除外。除此之外，我们征用来的一切资源，都可以归你所有。”

languages.text: «¿Es que {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}salvar un mundo habitado{/d} no es incentivo suficiente para usted?». {n}Heinrix chasquea la lengua, decepcionado.{/n} «Imagino que los habitantes del planeta estarán dispuestos a sacrificar todas sus posesiones materiales a cambio de ayuda. Evidentemente, recibirá todos los recursos requisados que Emelina juzguemos como no peligrosos ni prohibidos por la Santa Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es que salvar un mundo habitado no es incentivo suficiente para usted?». {n}Heinrix chasquea la lengua, decepcionado.{/n} «Imagino que los habitantes del planeta estarán dispuestos a sacrificar todas sus posesiones materiales a cambio de ayuda. Evidentemente, recibirá todos los recursos requisados que Emelina juzguemos como no peligrosos ni prohibidos por la Santa Inquisición».

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}人の住む惑星を救う{/d}ことは、陛下にとって十分な動機にはなり得ませんか？」{n}ハインリックスは失望して口を閉ざす。{/n}「この惑星の住民は、援助と引き換えに世俗的な所有物をすべて喜んで手放すだろうと想像します。もちろん、我とエメリナさんが危険でないと見なした、または聖なる異端審問庁によって禁止されていない徴発資源はすべて受け取ることになります」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}人の住む惑星を救う{/d}ことは、陛下にとって十分な動機にはなり得ませんか？」{n}ハインリックスは失望して口を閉ざす。{/n}「この惑星の住民は、援助と引き換えに世俗的な所有物をすべて喜んで手放すだろうと想像します。もちろん、我とエメリナさんが危険でないと見なした、または聖なる異端審問庁によって禁止されていない徴発資源はすべて受け取ることになります」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fait claquer sa langue, déçu.{/n}« Le {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}sauvetage d'un monde habité{/d} n'est-il pas une raison suffisante à vos yeux ? J'imagine que les habitants de cette planète seraient disposés à se séparer de toutes leurs possessions matérielles pour recevoir de l'aide. Bien entendu, vous recevrez toutes les ressources réquisitionnées qu'Emelina et moi-même n'estimerons pas dangereuses ou prohibées par la Sainte Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fait claquer sa langue, déçu.{/n} « Le sauvetage d'un monde habité n'est-il pas une raison suffisante à vos yeux ? J'imagine que les habitants de cette planète seraient disposés à se séparer de toutes leurs possessions matérielles pour recevoir de l'aide. Bien entendu, vous recevrez toutes les ressources réquisitionnées qu'Emelina et moi-même n'estimerons pas dangereuses ou prohibées par la Sainte Inquisition. »

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Die Rettung einer bewohnten Welt{/d} reicht Euch nicht als Anreiz?" {n}Heinrix runzelt enttäuscht die Stirn.{/n} "Ich könnte mir vorstellen, dass die Bewohner des Planeten bereit wären, sich von allem weltlichen Besitz zu trennen, wenn ihnen dafür geholfen wird. Ihr erhaltet alle requirierten Ressourcen, die ich und Emelina nicht für gefährlich halten und die von der Heiligen Inquisition nicht verboten sind."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Die Rettung einer bewohnten Welt reicht Euch nicht als Anreiz?" {n}Heinrix runzelt enttäuscht die Stirn.{/n} "Ich könnte mir vorstellen, dass die Bewohner des Planeten bereit wären, sich von allem weltlichen Besitz zu trennen, wenn ihnen dafür geholfen wird. Ihr erhaltet alle requirierten Ressourcen, die ich und Emelina nicht für gefährlich halten und die von der Heiligen Inquisition nicht verboten sind."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}İçinde insanların yaşadığı bir dünyayı kurtarmak{/d} yetmez mi?" {n}Heinrix, hayal kırıklığı dolu bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Gezegende yaşayanların, yardımın karşılığında ellerindeki tüm dünyevi malzemeleri teslim etmeye gönüllü olacaklarını tahmin ediyorum. Ben ve Emelina'nın, Kutsal Engizisyon'un tehlikeli veya yasaklı olarak addedilmediğini söylediğimiz tüm kaynakları alabileceksin."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Saving an inhabited world{/d} is not sufficient incentive for you?" {n}Heinrix tuts in disappointment.{/n} "I imagine the planet's inhabitants would be willing to part with all their worldly possessions in exchange for aid. Of course, you will receive whatever requisitioned resources I and Emelina deem not to be dangerous or prohibited by the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}İçinde yaşayan insanlar olan bir dünyayı kurtarmak{/d} senin için yeterli değil mi?" {n}Heinrix hayal kırıklığı dolu bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Gezegende yaşayanların, yardımın karşılığında ellerindeki tüm dünyevi malzemeleri teslim etmeye gönüllü olacaklarını tahmin ediyorum. Benim ve Emelina'nın, Kutsal Engizisyon tarafından tehlikeli veya yasaklı olarak addedilmediğini söylediğimiz tüm kaynakları alabileceksin."
